Questions.Text: Draw the Lewis dot structure for formaldehyde (methanal) using pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for ethene (ethylene) using pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for water using pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for carbon dioxide using pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for acetylene (ethyne) using either lines or pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for methanol (methyl alcohol) using either lines or pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
Draw the Lewis dot structure for carbon monoxide using either lines or pairs of dots to indicate electron pairs.
